segment.source: If you encounter errors while uploading app packages during the app submission process, you must resolve them before you can submit your app to the Store.
segment.target: If you encounter errors while uploading app packages during the app submission process, you must resolve them before you can submit your app to the Store.

segment.source: If you encounter errors while uploading app packages during the app submission process, you must resolve them before you can submit your app to the Store.
segment.target: If you encounter errors while uploading app packages during the app submission process, you must resolve them before you can submit your app to the Store.

segment.source: The error message will indicate what the problem is and what you might need to do in order to fix the issue.
segment.target: The error message will indicate what the problem is and what you might need to do in order to fix the issue.

segment.source: Here are a few pointers to additional info to help you resolve these errors.
segment.target: Here are a few pointers to additional info to help you resolve these errors.

segment.source: Package type errors for Windows Phone 8.1
segment.target: Package type errors for Windows Phone 8.1

segment.source: When you are updating apps that were previously published for Windows Phone 8.1, you may encounter errors related to package types.
segment.target: When you are updating apps that were previously published for Windows Phone 8.1, you may encounter errors related to package types.

segment.source: For more info about package type requirements, see Maintaining package compatibility for Windows Phone 8.1.
segment.target: For more info about package type requirements, see Maintaining package compatibility for Windows Phone 8.1.

segment.source: Failure to follow these requirements will result in package upload errors that will prevent you from completing your submission.
segment.target: Failure to follow these requirements will result in package upload errors that will prevent you from completing your submission.

segment.source: For info about resolving errors related to version numbers and the requirements when submitting updates, see Package version numbering.
segment.target: For info about resolving errors related to version numbers and the requirements when submitting updates, see Package version numbering.

segment.source: Additionally, be aware that if your submission has more than one Windows Phone 8.1 XAP, they must have the same version number.
segment.target: Additionally, be aware that if your submission has more than one Windows Phone 8.1 XAP, they must have the same version number.

segment.source: Note For additional questions related to other error messages and help with resolving them, please visit our forums.
segment.target: Note For additional questions related to other error messages and help with resolving them, please visit our forums.
